headline: Has Steel Dynamics Run Too Far After a 54% Surge or Is Value Still Left?
summary: Wondering if Steel Dynamics is still good value after such a big run? This breakdown will help you decide whether the stock still deserves a spot on your buy list. The share price has climbed 54.3% year to date and 52.2% over the last year, with a strong 11.7% gain in the past month despite a flat 7 day move of around 0.2%. Recent headlines have focused on resilient US steel demand, ongoing infrastructure and manufacturing investment, and continued enthusiasm for reshoring, all of which...
